#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,n,i,max_count,count,*a;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		count=0;
		max_count=1;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		a=new int[n];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		scanf("%d",&a[i]);
		for(i=1;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(a[i]==a[i-1])
			count++;
			else
			count=0;
			if(count>=max_count)
			max_count=count;
		}
		if(max_count==1)
		printf("0\n");
		else
		printf("%d\n",max_count);
	}
}
